input_args.text: 'Report Copyright Violation Mark of the Beast @ 5:47 of this video he lets us know what the Mark of the Beast is.. The antichrist will be able to control those who take this mark. Do you have eyes to see, ears to hear and a heart to understand? JESUS CHRIST is the ONLY WAY to SALVATION, DELIVERANCE and PEACE! Soon his grace will be taken from the earth and his WRATH will be poured out. Accept JESUS CHRIST while the GRACE of GOD is still available. May the Peace of God be with you! Love, Pray, Repent and Forgive. Page 1'
